Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As part of your utility patent order, LegalZoom provides professional patent illustrations, to show your invention to its best advantage. In order to begin, we will need the following from you:
1. A written description of what you want the drawing to convey, including all specific elements you want included 2. A sketch or photograph of your invention
Please send these materials by attaching them to your reply email (preferably in .gif, .pdf, .jpeg or .jpg format). If your document(s) file size exceeds 8MB, it is best that you upload your materials directly by uploading it here: http://legalzoom2.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/legalzoom2.cfg/php/enduser/ask.php . Make sure to include your LegalZoom number for reference.
Otherwise, you can send it by mail it to:
LegalZoom Attn: Patents 101 N. Brand Blvd., 11th Floor Glendale, CA 91203 Re: Order Number: |#|
After we receive your materials, we will move forward with setting up your attorney consultation.
Please note: In no case does LegalZoom share your materials with any third party not necessary for the completion of your order. Furthermore, LegalZoom does not retain physical copies of your submissions, and will not be held responsible for returning those materials to you. Submitted physical materials are securely destroyed.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
